metadata.title: Water Monitoring Sites - Taungurung Land and Waters Council Aboriginal Corporation
metadata.registered_aboriginal_party: Taungurung Land and Waters Council Aboriginal Corporation

sites.registered_aboriginal_party: Taungurung Land and Waters Council Aboriginal Corporation

field_descriptions.site_id: Unique identifier for the monitoring site
field_descriptions.site_name: Official name of the monitoring site
field_descriptions.site_type: Type of monitoring: 'surface water', 'groundwater', 'water quality', or 'rainfall'
field_descriptions.zero_gauge: Reference elevation for water level measurements
field_descriptions.datum: Geodetic datum used for coordinate reference
field_descriptions.catchment_management_authority: Responsible CMA (e.g., Goulburn Broken CMA, North Central CMA)
field_descriptions.groundwater_management_basin: GMB designation (e.g., Highlands, Murray, Gippsland, Otway, Wimmera-Mallee)
field_descriptions.mdb_water_resource_plan_groundwater: Murray-Darling Basin groundwater resource plan area
field_descriptions.mdb_water_resource_plan_surface_water: Murray-Darling Basin surface water resource plan area
field_descriptions.registered_aboriginal_party: RAP with cultural heritage management responsibilities
field_descriptions.rural_water_corporation: Rural water authority (e.g., Goulburn-Murray Water, Southern Rural Water)

data_notes.null_values: Sites without information for a specific field will have a null value
data_notes.filtering: This structure supports filtering by any field value in external programs
data_notes.data_source: Data should be obtained from https://data.water.vic.gov.au/WMIS/#/overview/stations using the 'Taungurung Land and Waters Council Aboriginal Corporation' filter under 'Registered Aboriginal Party'
